title: 96/571/EC: Commission Decision of 24 September 1996 amending Decision 95/340/EC drawing up a provisional list of third countries from which Member States authorize imports of milk and milk-based products and revoking Decision 94/70/EC (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 24 September 1996 amending Decision 95/340/EC drawing up a provisional list of third countries from which Member States authorize imports of milk and milk-based products and revoking Decision 94/70/EC (Text with EEA relevance) (96/571/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In the Annex of Decision 95/340/EC the following line is inserted in accordance with the alphabetic order of the ISO-code:
>TABLE>
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 September 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 268, 14. 9. 1992, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 200, 24. 8. 1995, p. 38.
(3) OJ No L 123, 23. 5. 1996, p. 24.
